channel.title: How do i make it not a safe zone
channel.description:
well im having a problem here. i want to make the place ::pkbox just like in fr33sc4pe, but im not using that source. i already have the coords and everything. but in this server you can only pk in the wildy not anywhere else, so i decided to make pkbox so they can fight there too, as a popular fighting zone. i get the coords of what i want and i want to make it an attackable zone.
the coords are the following :
[code]if (absY >=2764 && absY <=2772 && absX >=2759 && absX <=2761) if (absY >=2764 && absY <=2766 && absX >=2762 && absX <=2767) if (absY >=2764 && absY <=2772 && absX >=2768 && absX <=2770)all in one line of course.[/code].
i can't add it in public boolean NonWildy because its for safe zones. so do i have to edit the coords that are already there so it cannot include the coords above ^^. and where do i add them? Posted on: March 25, 2007, 03:01:17 PM

item.title: How do i make it not a safe zone
item.dc:creator: @Full_Metalst Full Metalst
item.description:
@Full_Metalst wrote:

DELETE those coords if you’re making a 317 server. If you delete them, they’re not safezones anymore.

Delete these:

if (absY >=2764 && absY <=2772 && absX >=2759 && absX <=2761) if (absY >=2764 && absY <=2766 && absX >=2762 && absX <=2767) if (absY >=2764 && absY <=2772 && absX >=2768 && absX <=2770)
Delete the coords under public boolean nonWild()

I hate Newbies because I tell them something and they post the same thing again…

Read full topic
item.source: How do i make it not a safe zone
